title: So you want to delay assassin burst..
body:
But let Diana, Akali and Elise all keep their instant 100-0 mechanics.

KKKKKKKKK


Oh wait, they are "divers" meaning they can burst harder than most assassins can, but are tanky enough to withstand turrets. Right.

replies.body: Now that you mention it, I've found myself more afraid of divers than assassins this season.
You are more afraid of Aatrox, then Kha'zix? Man, you have some strange fears.
I have an irrational fear of completely unviable champions.

Not irrational. The people who play them are terrifying masterminds who have found a way to make that champion viable.

Fear is the correct response.
The memories of stomping my victims with the old Poppy {{sticker:sg-jinx}}

I can play Kat, Teemo and Lux in any role.  You will fear full lethality Kat.  You will know the dread of the constant threat of Lux Jg.  You will cry from shrooms when fighting Teemo support.  You will deal with it.
if youre playing lethality kat youre living in the past, crict is where its at.
{{champion:266}} "Teach them to fear us."
Dayum, where did you use hydra in that combo?

since when did riot introduce anim canceling? I know that there was always a slight amount of AA animation you could cancel for most champs, but it was usually negligible stuff that didn't have an extreme impact on games, but ever since I came back from my year or so hiatus, it seems like anim canceling has become not only super common, but also incredibly broken...
I believe animation cancelling started being used more after Riven's immense popularity.
That's because Diver's are basically just tanky assassins that feel like mobile Juggernauts at times.
I like how riot tries to turn diana into a dps mage with the passive changes but she still just Q + R's in for the insta kill lol

Yep. Landed entire combo perfectly as nerfed Ahri with ignite on a Diana. Diana shields with a sliver of health Q+R+auto, I instantly die. Mind you, this is in a mid to late game situation where I was pretty fed as Ahri, and the Diana jg only had two kills. I remember this so clearly because I was baffled with the thought that I couldn't have played that situation any better.
Diana taught me to stop being stubborn and rush a {{item:1057}} vs champs with bs base damage that will instant kill me if they land 1 spell.
QRW + TLD proc, the autos are just there for off chance they did survive
You charge the third auto and go in

You forgot Wukong.

........

Though while I do hate certain divers, but I do feel delayed burst is probably the worst way to implement conditions on assassinations tbh.

At least pookong ult is delayed.

Wukong Ult Damage delayed huh? {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

https://i.imgur.com/5dT2nIU.gifv

Elise doesn't 100-0 anyone unless she's ahead. 


Diana has no escape. That's what makes her a non-assassin. Her "instant" burst is dependent on hitting her Q.


Akali is an assassin so...
Diana's Q isn't particularly hard to hit IMO. Elise CAN 100-0 someone, but not in burst; she has to stick to her target for a bit.
100-0 in terms of the title "assassin burst" does not mean sticking to a target for a bit.

all assassins burst is dependant on hitting there abilities.  What kind of argument is that?
Akali however cant miss her abilities and there  is the biggest problem. 
Dianna is just akali 2.0
If Diana misses her Q, or isn't able to reset her R, she cannot kill you (unless she is insanely fed). She is very predictable.
Saw a Diana delete and ADC in less than a second. Disgusting.

You call it disgusting.
I call it revenge for being an ADC in this forsaken META.

> [{quoted}](name=ChiTenshi,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WzA7GJiF,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-10-23T11:59:34.707+0000)
>
> You call it disgusting.
> I call it revenge for being an ADC in this forsaken META.

In _THIS_ meta, that is entirely singlehandedly decided by adcs and their lane partners?

You jest, kind sir.

The strange duality of these boards as of late..

Post #1: "How are we supposed to deal with these hyper carries?! This is unacceptable!!"

Post #2: "Why are assassins able to insta burst squishy targets?! This is unacceptable!!"
Almost like the boards are a collection of individuals with different opinions, instead of one homogeneous organism. WEIRD, isn't it?
The _strange_ part is that both get upvotes.

This excuse doesn't work when Boards tends to stick to a certain narrative and everything else gets downvoted to oblivion.

It is a hivemind, saying "well sally thinks differently" isn't the point.
All I'm saying is its a damn good thing that most people on these boards will never design a competitive game. My lord it wouls be such a catastrophy.
akalis an actual assassin tho lol
Good meme

She is though, lol?

Is Katarina also now a Diver and not an assassin?
How low you need to fall, to complain about Diana.. i dont even..

If assassins didn't have delayed burst, there might be a chance the game wouldn't be decided on which adc does well. I don't understand why riot is so scared of assassins doing their jobs but hold off as long as they can on nerfing ardent, cho, adc's and many other things. Fuck, give adc's a "rework" like assassins if that means destroying them too.
{{champion:105}} was higher priority, only his Q, E and ult had counterplay hehe
Why is this circle jerk even getting upvoted? none of those champions are even op.
akali has a delay. Its her auto attack ;)
Actually, Elise and Diana both have some sort of delay. Diana has to hit her Q and Elise normally has to hit her stun aswell.
And after diana lands her q she proceeds to disintegrate you from the face of the earth. Her q r w and decree deal shit loads of dmg. And even if you survive she still has her aa to kill you.
Dealing a ton of damage does not equal insta-bursting. It's still delayed. Diana's Q delay is the equivalent of current Rengar. Especially if she has to hit you with her passive/jump on you twice.

What? She uses q and the moment it hits you she uses ulti w and e and procs thunderlords. Most squishies cant fight her back. And i forgot to mention she deals shit tons of dmg in the split second. That is after she lands her q.

She is an assassin to squishies but almost every squishy champion has self-peel in League. Especially with the current meta that favors squishies through the shield power. Regardless, she doesn't have any damage after her intial combo, assuming her Q even hits.

Not really. Not every squishy champ has self peel. Or rather, some have but they cant really stop a targeted dash. And the majority of them dont have the mobility to evade her q. Also this shield power is most strong on adc's since they have the lifesteal to gain back hp.

The mobility to evade her Q? Depending on distance, you can almost always evade it by predicting it, lol. Only at close range it's practically impossible. The shield power in general is off the charts. Imagine an Ardent Janna using her E, ult and locket for example. Redemption on top of it and you have 3 health bars restored.

Not to mention Diana's singular delayed burst means she's a Diver/Fighter type of a champion. That's like complaining about a juggernaut one-shotting you because Darius has 5 stacks on you and you're a squishie. No shit, Sherlock he will!
